SPONSORS

PATREON
If you’re a podcaster, Youtuber, musician, writer, illustrator... if you’re a creative person of any kind, or simply love one, now is the time to check out patreon.com. Now is the time to join the millions of fans and creators who are changing the way art is valued together.

SHUTTERSTOCK
Shutterstock has MILLIONS of high quality stock vectors, photos, illustrations and more! Check them out here: shutterstock.com/explore/creativepeptalk

itunes:title: 282 - 6 Tips On How To Build Your Following + 4 Fan Favorite CPT Ideas of All Time!
itunes:author: Efdot, Frannerd, Dina Rodriguez, Andy J. Pizza
itunes:summary:
If you are looking for a boost of creative community in these isolated times: LISTEN TO THIS NOW!!! This episode gave me some serious feelings and I can not wait for you to hear it!!

This episode is made up from 3 tips from me, 3 special guests and YOU our patreon backers!!

In this episode you will get:
3 Tips For Building a Dedicated Audience from ME Andy J. Pizza
3 Audience Building Tips from SUPER SPECIAL GUESTS!
4 Creative Pep Talk Fan Favorite Tips from YOU our Patreon Backers!!!
FEELINGS!! EMOTIONS! PEP! SOME FAITH IN HUMANITY!!!

This episode was made in special partnership with Patreon.com and our Patreon backers!!! WE LOVE YOU BOTH!
